00053     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054     /// @class PhysMotionState
00055     /// @headerfile physactor.h
00056     /// @brief This class is used by the actor class to sync between the physics world and the graphical world.
00057     /// @details This class provides the link for position and orientation between the two worlds in the engine.
00058     /// This is called on every step(frame) of the world to sync the actor if it has moved.
00059     ///////////////////////////////////////
00060 
00061     class PhysMotionState : public btMotionState {
00062         private:
00063             friend class ActorBase;
00064             Ogre::SceneNode* snode;
00065             btTransform initposition;
00066 
00067         public:
00068             /// @brief Blank Constructor.
00069             /// @details Basic no-initialization constructor.
00070             PhysMotionState();
00071             /// @brief Constructor.
00072             /// @details The class constructor.
00073             /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00074             PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00075             /// @brief Destructor.
00076             /// @details The class destructor.
00077             virtual ~PhysMotionState();
00078             /// @brief Sets the scenenode.
00079             /// @details Sets the scenenode to be sync'd every step.
00080             /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00081             void SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00082             /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00083             /// @details Sets the position the actor will be placed in when it is added to the world.
00084             /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitPosition().
00085             /// @param Position The vector3 representing the location to be used.
00086             void SetPosition(PhysVector3 position);
00087             /// @brief Sets the initial orientation.
00088             /// @details Sets the orientation the actor will have when it is added to the world.
00089             /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitOrientation().
00090             /// @param Orientation The vector3 representing the orientation to be used.
00091             void SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation);
00092 
00093             /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00094             /// @details This function is called on by the physics world upon adding the actor to the world.
00095             /// This function uses the previous set vector3 that was set with SetInitPosition(). @n
00096             /// Default position is (0,0,0).
00097             /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00098             virtual void getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const;
00099             /// @brief Updates the position and orientation.
00100             /// @details This function is called each step(frame) by the physics world to sync the physics and graphical worlds.
00101             /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00102             virtual void setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans);
00103     };
00104

00108     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00109     {
00110         this->GameWorld = _World;
00111         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00112         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00113         this->MotionState = new PhysMotionState(this->node);
00114         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00115         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00116     }
00117 
00118     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00119     {
00120         delete MotionState;
00121         delete Shape;
00122     }
00123 
00124     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00125     {
00126         // Get the mesh from the entity
00127         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00128 
00129         // Get the submesh and associated data
00130         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00131         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00132         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00133 
00134         // Get the position element
00135         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00136 
00137         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00138         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00139 
00140         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00141         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00142 
00143         // Get the number of triangles
00144         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00145 
00146         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00147         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00148         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00149 
00150         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00151         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00152         float* pReal = NULL;
00153         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00154         {
00155             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00156             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00157             vertices[j] = pt;
00158         }
00159         vBuffer->unlock();
00160         size_t index_offset = 0;
00161         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00162 
00163         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00164         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00165         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00166 
00167         if (use32bitindexes)
00168         {
00169             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00170             {
00171                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00172             }
00173         }
00174         else
00175         {
00176             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00177             {
00178                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00179             }
00180         }
00181         iBuffer->unlock();
00182 
00183         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00184 
00185         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00186         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00187 
00188         // Setup the tri mesh
00189         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00190         int i=0;
00191 
00192         // For every triangle
00193         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00194         {
00195             // Set each vertex
00196             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00197             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00198             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00199 
00200             // Add it into the trimesh
00201             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00202 
00203             // Increase index count
00204             i+=3;
00205         }
00206         delete[] vertices;
00207         delete[] indices;
00208 
00209         return trimesh;
00210     }

00213     {
00214         this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00215     }

00227     PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00228     {
00229         PhysVector3 temp;
00230         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00231         return temp;
00232     }

00234     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00235     {
00236         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00237         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00238     }
00239 
00240     PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation()
00241     {
00242         PhysVector3 temp;
00243         btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00244         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(trans.getOrigin());
00245         return temp;
00246     }

00253     void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00254     {
00255         btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00256         temp.setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00257     }

00298     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00299     {
00300         PhysVector3 temp;
00301         //temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00302         temp = GetBulletLocation();
00303         this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00304         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00305     }

00310         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00311     }

00313     void ActorBase::SetStatic()
00314     {
00315         int x=1;
00316         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00317     }

00332     void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00333     {
00334         btScalar bmass=pmass;
00335         this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00336         CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00337     }
00338 
00339     void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* btWorld)
00340     {
00341         btWorld->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00342         AttachToGraphics();
00343     }

00345     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic()
00346     {
00347         delete Shape;
00348 
00349         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00350         //btTriangleMesh *pshape = this->CreateTrimesh();
00351         btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00352         btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00353         btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00354         hull->buildHull(margin);
00355         //Shape=hull;
00356         tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00357         btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00358         for (int b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00359         {
00360             convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00361         }
00362         delete tmpshape;
00363         delete hull;
00364         //delete pshape;
00365         Shape = convexShape;
00366         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00367         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00368         //btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00369         //btVector3 inertia = this->physrigidbody->getInvInertiaDiagLocal();
00370         //this->Shape->calculateLocalInertia(1/this->physrigidbody->getInvMass(), inertia);
00371         //this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(1/this->physrigidbody->getInvMass(), inertia);
00372 
00373     }
00374 
00375     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00376     {
00377         delete Shape;
00378 
00379         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00380         //btTriangleMesh *pshape = this->CreateTrimesh();
00381         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00382         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00383         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00384         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00385         //delete pshape;
00386     }

00420     PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00421     {

00425     PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00426     {

00428         this->initposition.setIdentity();

00431     PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00432     {
00433         if (snode!=NULL)
00434         {
00435             delete snode;
00436         }
00437     }

00454     void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00455     {
00456         worldTrans=initposition;
00457     }
00458 
00459     void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00460     {
00461         btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00462         this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00463         btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00464         this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00465     }
